name: orbidi
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wo(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

stmt.origin: 3bitr4i(wo(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)), wi(wn(w0), wb(w1, w2)), wb(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wi(wn(w0), wb(w1, w2)), wb(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))
-| wb(wo(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wi(wn(w0), wb(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)), wb(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wi(wn(w0), wb(w1, w2)), wb(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))
-| wb(wo(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wi(wn(w0), wb(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)), wb(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wi(wn(w0), wb(w1, w2)), wb(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wi(wn(w0), wb(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)), wb(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wo(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wi(wn(w0), wb(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)), wb(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))

stmt.origin: bibi12i(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2), wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)), wb(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))
-| wb(wo(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w1))
-| wb(wo(w0, w2), wi(wn(w0), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w1))
-| wb(wo(w0, w2), wi(wn(w0), w2))

|- wb(wo(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w0, w2), wi(wn(w0), w2))
|- wb(wo(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

comment: Disjunction distributes over the biconditional. An axiom of system DS in Vladimir Lifschitz, "On calculational proofs" (1998), ~ http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/summary?doi=10.1.1.25.3384 . (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2005.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 4-Feb-2013.)
